```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr) 
library(purrr)

homicides <- read_csv("../data/homicide-data.csv") 

homicides <- homicides %>% 
  unite(city_name, "city", "state", sep = ", " )

unsolved <- homicides %>% 
  filter(disposition %in% c("Closed without arrest", "Open/No arrest")) %>% 
  group_by(city_name) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  rename(n_homicides = "n")
